profile

Class AccountModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • profile.AccountModel

  • public class AccountModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for MVC holding the state of a Facebook account and various methods for its manipulation
    Author:
    Tim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccountModel(org.json.simple.JSONObject jaccount) 
      AccountModel(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String imagefilePath) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFeedObserver(NewsFeedObserver observer) 
      void addFriend(AccountModel friend)
      Links an different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way Checks to ensure that new AccountModel is not this and is not already a friend Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully added
      void addFriendsListObserver(FriendsListObserver observer) 
      void addPicObserver(PictureObserver observer) 
      void addWallObserver(WallObserver observer) 
      void deactivate()
      Deactivation of account: removes all friends and empties wall and friend files feed is NOT emptied because implementation has feed saving posts of other AccountModels
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object other) 
      void friendPost(AccountModel friend, java.lang.String message)
      Takes a post from a friend and puts it in own news feed
      java.lang.String getFeedPosts()
      Gets all feed posts formatted into a single String to initialization of view Formatting delegated to NewsFeedModel class
      java.util.List<AccountModel> getFriends() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.lang.String getPicturePath() 
      java.lang.String getWallPosts()
      Gets all wall posts formatted with each post on a new line Used in initializing wall of views
      void initialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AccountModel> accounts)
      Initializes chosen account from input files w/ JSON format
      void jsonWriteCollection(java.util.Collection<?> collection, java.io.File file)
      Generic helper method for saveState() saves a Collection as a JSONArray to a specified file Contents of Collection saved by their toString() method as a string literal Assumes content of Collection can be represented purely by toString()
      void jsonWriteEmpty(java.io.File file)
      Rewrites a file to be an empty JSONArray
      void post(java.lang.String message)
      Posts a message on one's own wall and friends' news feeds
      void removeFriend(AccountModel friend)
      Removes different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way; breaks both sides of link Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully removed
      void saveState()
      Saves the state of the AccountModel for comparison and possible recovery List of friends, wall info, and news feed stored as separate text files
      void setName(java.lang.String name) 
      void setPicture(java.lang.String imageFilePath)
      Sets the picture (path) of the AccountModel and notifies PictureObservers
      java.lang.String toJSON()
      Converts this Object to a JSON-formatted String Used in place of library's JSONWriter for formatting easier to read by humans
      java.lang.String toString()

        public java.lang.String getWallPosts()
        Gets all wall posts formatted with each post on a new line Used in initializing wall of views
        Returns:

      • getFeedPosts

        public java.lang.String getFeedPosts()
        Gets all feed posts formatted into a single String to initialization of view Formatting delegated to NewsFeedModel class
        Returns:
        formatted String of all news feed posts

      • getFriends

        public java.util.List<AccountModel> getFriends()

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(AccountModel friend)
        Links an different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way Checks to ensure that new AccountModel is not this and is not already a friend Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully added
        Parameters:
        friend - the AccountModel to attempt to add

      • removeFriend

        public void removeFriend(AccountModel friend)
        Removes different AccountModel as a friend to this one All friendships are two-way; breaks both sides of link Notifies FriendsListObservers to update if friend successfully removed
        Parameters:
        friend - the AccountModel to attempt to add

        public void friendPost(AccountModel friend,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Takes a post from a friend and puts it in own news feed
        Parameters:
        friend - the friend who posted
        message - the post's contents

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Deactivation of account: removes all friends and empties wall and friend files feed is NOT emptied because implementation has feed saving posts of other AccountModels

        public java.lang.String toJSON()
        Converts this Object to a JSON-formatted String Used in place of library's JSONWriter for formatting easier to read by humans
        Returns:
        String representing this data in JSON format

      • saveState

        public void saveState()
        Saves the state of the AccountModel for comparison and possible recovery List of friends, wall info, and news feed stored as separate text files

      • jsonWriteCollection

        public void jsonWriteCollection(java.util.Collection<?> collection,
                                java.io.File file)
        Generic helper method for saveState() saves a Collection as a JSONArray to a specified file Contents of Collection saved by their toString() method as a string literal Assumes content of Collection can be represented purely by toString()
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection to save
        file - the file to write to

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AccountModel> accounts)
        Initializes chosen account from input files w/ JSON format
